thread.title: ‘It is a Total Witch Hunt!’: Trump Defends ‘Honest Man’ Jeff Sessions, Says ‘Real Story’ is ‘Illegal Leaks’
thread.title_full: ‘It is a Total Witch Hunt!’: Trump Defends ‘Honest Man’ Jeff Sessions, Says ‘Real Story’ is ‘Illegal Leaks’

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘It is a Total Witch Hunt!’: Trump Defends ‘Honest Man’ Jeff Sessions, Says ‘Real Story’ is ‘Illegal Leaks’
text:
‘It is a Total Witch Hunt!’: Trump Defends ‘Honest Man’ Jeff Sessions, Says ‘Real Story’ is ‘Illegal Leaks’ by Justin Baragona | 8:26 pm, March 2nd, 2017 
Following Attorney General Jeff Sessions decision to recuse himself from any upcoming investigations of presidential campaigns — following news that Sessions had spoken to the Russian ambassador during the Trump campaign — President Donald Trump released a statement offering support for Sessions while hammering Democrats. JUST IN: President Trump releases a statement on Attorney General Jeff Sessions, says "It is a total witch hunt!" pic.twitter.com/Jogoc25Ggt 
— CBS Evening News (@CBSEveningNews) March 3, 2017 
As you can see, Trump’s statement hit on a few familiar themes, namely that the “real story is all of the illegal leaks” and that Democrats are “saving face” because “they lost the election.” 
[image via screengrab]
